data.text:
Kid N’ Play Christopher Reid

When you hear the name Kid N’ Play, you most likely think about the 1990 film, House Party. The cult classic starring Christopher “Kid” Reid and Christopher “Play” Martin, also starring Martin Lawrence, Tisha Campbell-Martin, A.J. Johnson, Full Force, and John Witherspoon that hit movie theaters a quarter of a century ago.

However, Christopher Reid is more than just a guy who wanted to throw a party when their parents were out of town. He’s been entertaining comedy crowds all over the world for decades with his hilarious stories, good energy and contemporary comedy. Not your average celebrity turned standup. He’s got the skills to pay the bills and funny.
